choices.name: Plastic waste generation
choices.description: The amount of plastic waste generated. Prior to management, i.e. this also includes waste that is properly incinerated or recycled.

choices.name: Mismanaged waste
choices.description: Mismanaged plastic waste includes materials burned in open pits, dumped into seas or open waters, or disposed of in unsanitary landfills and dumpsites.

choices.name: Plastic emitted to ocean
choices.description: This is an annual estimate of plastic emissions. A country's total does not include waste that is exported overseas, which may be at higher risk of entering the ocean.

choices.name: Trade: exports
choices.description: Plastic waste that is exported by all modes of transport in a given year.

choices.name: Trade: imports
choices.description: Plastic waste that is imported by all modes of transport in a given year.

choices.name: Trade: net exports
choices.description: Net exports of plastic waste are calculated as a country's plastic waste exports minus its imports.

choices.name: Per capita
choices.description: Per capita values are calculated by dividing the total amount by the population of the country.

choices.name: Share of world total
choices.description: The share of the world total is calculated by dividing the country's total by the global total.

config.title: Plastic waste generation
config.subtitle: This measures total plastic waste generation prior to management and therefore does not represent the quantity of plastic at risk of polluting waterways, rivers and the ocean environment.
